rev.desc.rev.desc: update panel set.activity, rollback negdatestamp value
update panel set.activityactions.name, merge from PD4, add:
if (file.name in $L.object="imTask") then ($L.full.name=full.name in $G.pm.global.environment)
update panel start, get.object, set.activity, support SYSATTACHMENTS
Added check.get.object panel before the get.object panel
Don't call se.get.object if an object record has been passed in.
Panel set.activity
Removed the line that set last.activity in $L.file (11th line).
Changed from:
if (file.name in $L.object="service management") then ($L.full.name=full.name in $G.sm.global.environment)
To:
if (file.name in $L.object="probsummary") then ($L.full.name=full.name in $G.pm.global.environment)
if (file.name in $L.object="rootcause") then ($L.full.name=full.name in $G.rc.global.environment)
if (file.name in $L.object="incidents") then ($L.full.name=full.name in $G.sm.global.environment)
if (file.name in $L.object="rootcausetask") then ($L.full.name=full.name in $G.rc.global.environment)
decide.post panel -- modified condition from:
not null(activity.post.link in $L.object)
to:
not null($L.activity) and not null(activity.post.link in $L.object)
... makes sure the posting link is not checked unless an activity record has been generated
no changes...just testing
Updated code to support posting of activity information for custom fields.
Added new parm for passing in flag for whether or not activity record will be visible to a customer.
Added new parm for passing in Object record.
Genericized processing to work off of new fields from Object record.

Modified the no records selected exit on get.operator to exit to init.actions instead of exit.error, it was causing problems when backround process were running. This is related to the changes for scr 24937
Replaced previous change for set.user.activity panel:
Added the following lines.
$L.op.full.name=full.name in $L.op.record;if ($L.op.full.name="") then ($L.op.full.name=NULL)
if (full.name in $G.pm.global.environment=true) then (operator in $L.activity=nullsub($L.op.full.name, operator()))
Previous changes wer for SCR 24937 task 30043

Modified apm.activity to use set the full name in the activity record if set in the enviornment record.
start: $L.operator.query="name=\""+str(operator())+"\""
decide.use.module: changed the normal exit to init.operator.
init.operator: New rinit panel that initializes the $L.op.record variable as an operator file variable.
get.operator: New select panel that selects the curent users operator record using the query set up on the start panel, $L.operator.query.
set.user.activity: Added the following line. if (full.name in $G.pm.global.environment=true) then (operator in $L.activity=nullsub(full.name in $L.op.record, operator()))
no change made testing when closing tickets.

descript.descript: update panel set.activity, rollback negdatestamp value
update panel set.activityactions.name, merge from PD4, add:
if (file.name in $L.object="imTask") then ($L.full.name=full.name in $G.pm.global.environment)
update panel start, get.object, set.activity, support SYSATTACHMENTS
Added check.get.object panel before the get.object panel
Don't call se.get.object if an object record has been passed in.
Panel set.activity
Removed the line that set last.activity in $L.file (11th line).
Changed from:
if (file.name in $L.object="service management") then ($L.full.name=full.name in $G.sm.global.environment)
To:
if (file.name in $L.object="probsummary") then ($L.full.name=full.name in $G.pm.global.environment)
if (file.name in $L.object="rootcause") then ($L.full.name=full.name in $G.rc.global.environment)
if (file.name in $L.object="incidents") then ($L.full.name=full.name in $G.sm.global.environment)
if (file.name in $L.object="rootcausetask") then ($L.full.name=full.name in $G.rc.global.environment)
decide.post panel -- modified condition from:
not null(activity.post.link in $L.object)
to:
not null($L.activity) and not null(activity.post.link in $L.object)
... makes sure the posting link is not checked unless an activity record has been generated
no changes...just testing
Updated code to support posting of activity information for custom fields.
Added new parm for passing in flag for whether or not activity record will be visible to a customer.
Added new parm for passing in Object record
Genericized processing to work off of new fields from Object record

Modified the no records selected exit on get.operator to exit to init.actions instead of exit.error, it was causing problems when backround process were running. This is related to the changes for scr 24937
Replaced previous change for set.user.activity panel:
Added the following lines.
$L.op.full.name=full.name in $L.op.record;if ($L.op.full.name="") then ($L.op.full.name=NULL)
if (full.name in $G.pm.global.environment=true) then (operator in $L.activity=nullsub($L.op.full.name, operator()))
Previous changes wer for SCR 24937 task 30043

Modified apm.activity to use set the full name in the activity record if set in the enviornment record.
start: $L.operator.query="name=\""+str(operator())+"\""
decide.use.module: changed the normal exit to init.operator.
init.operator: New rinit panel that initializes the $L.op.record variable as an operator file variable.
get.operator: New select panel that selects the curent users operator record using the query set up on the start panel, $L.operator.query.
set.user.activity: Added the following line. if (full.name in $G.pm.global.environment=true) then (operator in $L.activity=nullsub(full.name in $L.op.record, operator()))
no change made testing when closing tickets.
